mapper.select: select * from (select product_id, product_name, condition from product where member_id=#{member_id})t1 left outer join (select o.product_id as op,sum(price*rent_month) total,count(o.product_id) cnt from orderlist o,product p where p.product_id = o.product_id and p.member_id=#{member_id} group by o.product_id)t2 on t1.product_id=t2.op order by t1.product_id

select * from product
AND product_id=${product_id} AND category='${category}' AND product_name like '${product_name}' AND member_id='${member_id}' AND quality='${quality}' AND price=${price} AND condition='${condition}'
order by product_id
select count(*) from product where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from product where member_id = #{member_id} and condition = #{condition}
select * from(select rownum a, product_id, condition, product_name, category, quality,member_id,price,main_img,sub_img from(select * from product where member_id=#{member_id} order by product_id))
select nvl(count(*),0) from product where condition='물품게시'
select count(*) from product where item=#{item} and condition='물품게시'
select product_id, item, product_name, m.member_id, condition, a.address2, quality, price from product p, member m, address a where p.member_id=m.member_id and m.address_id=a.address_id
mapper.update: update product set condition=#{condition} where product_id=#{product_id}
